name: SecurityMatters
overview:
SecurityMatters is a spin-off from the University of Twente located in Enschede, The Netherlands. The core of our current technology was developed at the University of Twente in more than 12 man-years of research.

Our core business is delivering technologies for network security. We provide state-of-the-art and next generation solutions for network intrusion detection. Our technology aims at protecting high-value networks from internal and external known and unknows threats. Our target customers range from financial institutions to government agencies and utility companies. We are currently developing new solutions to effectively monitor industrial process control networks from cyber-threats (such as Stuxnet).
